name: The Judas Trials: Interactive Bible
description:
Should you find thiS game please do not givE it to your local authorities. They cannot be trusted. Nobody can. Spread this game like a Virus, spread the sEcrets they doN’t want told. Spread it to those who hold no power, spread it to the internet, spread it and destroy them. They are truly monsters and deserve no mercy.

I cannot say what is held within or they will find this and remove it. They are searching and it won’t be long for I am silenced. Do not let them destroy the evidence.

Yes I am aware the game is falling apart at the seams, that is irrelevant. My tampering to include the excluded was not welcome in the code.

aopz pz vusf aol ilnpuupun. hu luk av aolpy ylpnu pz jvtpun. aol pumvythapvu dpss il slhrlk,

aolpy zljylaz dpss il lewvzlk, huk aol mhtpsplz vm aol klhk dpao mpuhssf il npclu wlhjl,

pm aol dvysk kvlzu'a luk mpyza.

(OOC) Warning:

This game contains disturbing imagery and subjects, such as distorted religious messages and moments, and serious implied gore, violence, and crimes against humanity. Most gore isn’t explicitly shown but isn’t completely hidden either.

Also don’t download and repost my game anywhere, if you want to spread it like a virus as the story intends you can tell people about it, or write about it online, or play it on YouTube.

Thanks in advance, and enjoy!
